indexed.description: Comma-separated list of indexed properties (available for full-text search in editor)

styleref.description: this (optional) uri should point to a textstyle.json object. This allows defining the style in a separate file, that can be user-defined or system-defined, which allows the creator of the game specify consistent text styles for his/her games

style.description: This allows defining the style embedded within the text in a compact way. It must be taken into account that if both style-ref and style are declared, style is applied as it has priority over style-ref.
